statements: UPDATE WaterAndSanitation SET water_source = 'Well' WHERE region_id = 1;
UPDATE WaterAndSanitation SET sanitation_practices = 'Improved' WHERE region_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterAndSanitation SET water_usage = 150.25, sanitation_practices = 'Improved' WHERE region_id = 1
UPDATE WaterAndSanitation SET water_source = 'River', sanitation_practices = 'Basic', water_usage = 75.50 WHERE region_id = 2
UPDATE WaterUsage SET UsageAmount = 500 WHERE ID = 1
UPDATE SanitationPractices SET PracticeDetail = 'Regular cleaning schedule' WHERE Area = 'Kitchen'
UPDATE WaterUsage SET UsageAmount = 500 WHERE Area = 'Kitchen' AND RecordedAt = '2022-05-01 10:00:00'
UPDATE SanitationPractices SET PracticeDetail = 'Regular cleaning with disinfectant' WHERE Area = 'Bathroom' AND RecordedAt = '2022-05-15 08:30:00'
UPDATE WaterUsage SET water_consumption = 4.5, water_source = 'Tap Water' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE HealthImpact SET water_related_illness = true, sanitation_related_illness = false, impact_description = 'No major health impact reported' WHERE household_id = 100;
UPDATE WaterUsage SET water_consumption = 10.5, water_source = 'tap water' WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE SanitationPractices SET waste_disposal = 'composting', toilet_facilities = true, hygiene_practices = 'hand washing' WHERE household_id = 456;
UPDATE WaterUsage SET water_usage_volume = 50 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE HealthStatistics SET health_condition = 'Healthy' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterUsage SET water_usage_volume = 500.75, usage_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE SanitationPractices SET practice_description = 'Implemented new waste segregation system.', practice_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE WaterUsageTrends SET usage_amount = 500 WHERE location = 'City A';
UPDATE SanitationPractices SET compliance = TRUE, type = 'Improved' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE WaterUsageTrends SET usage_amount = 500 WHERE location = 'City A';
UPDATE HealthIndicators SET value = 8.5, indicator_name = 'Mortality Rate' WHERE location = 'Village B';
